Group.Group Name: m.3.3.w Fansubs / Misc. Enlightened Entertainment Works

Subbed Projects.Show Name: Amada Anime Series: Super Mario Brothers
Ano Hi Mita Hana no Namae wo Bokutachi wa Mada Shiranai.

Good Comments: Extremely good release with fabulous hardsubbed karaoke & typesetting, but marred by some typos and editing errors like "She is a part me."
Seriously, pick them.  The realism of this anime requires m.3.3.w's more natural dialogue.  UTW's okay, and I love Frostii, but m.3.3.w's subs even surpass the Frostii-Saizen combo.
almost perfect already, but gg is even better.
They release slower for the quality. So if you care for quality, go with them.
Bad Comments: best quality for this oversubbed show
Quality subs. Would go with UTW for speed but m33w is always good too.
m.3.3.w always has been and will be awesome.

Good Comments: I like how they make release it fast and how you can easily understand/ translation is good.
Their subs are great, but dropped..
Bad Comments: One of Old Eng Subbers I have discovered and thanks to them, I can hardly get by when they are not there to continue sub some old anime :)

Good Comments: Best typesetting, vid quality.  Good tl.
Perfect! The best to archive, excellent translations.
Very good subs, and video quality isn't bad either.
Great communtity, near perfect translations good quality, infomation subscriptsThis is a great sub group of which can hang with the best

great subs, took forever to release them

Solid work. Haven't noticed any significant deviations from the actual Japanese so far, either (that I can recognize).

good balance of speed and quality

theyre the best! what they lack in speed they make up for in quality
subs are amazing. amazing how they understand and translate so clearly

I found their subs to be simple, yet sublime. The font was easy on the eyes, both in style and color, and they didn't employ any of the annoying self-promoting tactics we've come to expect from other subbing groups.
The subbing was clear with no major grammatical errors or odd-sounding translations.
